page.title: 15BMX Racing
page.content: BMXing is a sport which is done on special bikes.There are two types of BMXing.The first is racing.You need a special track with lots of jumps and humps.The other BMXing is called freestyle.For this you need a very strong bike.You can't just use an ordinary bike.For both events you have to have a BMX.In freestyle you need a lot of space and equipment like a ramp.There are lots of ways which you can fly off the end of a ramp in midair and they have names like a crossup or a Bob Haro.Another ramp for freestyle is a quaterpipe.You go up the ramp which is curved,go flying off the top turn right around then land back on the ramp and come back down it.You can also do tricks without ramps on the ground.You can walk around on your bike or do hops on your front tyre.I like freestyle best.
